author: holgerd77
content:
Just did the following rough Berlin HF mainnet date estimation:

Current Date: Tuesday 2021-04-13, 10:17am UTC
Current Block Number: 12231128 (https://etherscan.io/block/12231128)
Average Block Time:  13,25 (decimal FP, taken from https://etherscan.io/chart/blocktime)

Time Diff: (12244000-12231128)*13,25/60/60 = 47,38 hours

**Estimated Berlin Mainnet HF Date: Thursday 2021-04-15, 10:00am UTC**

Please cross-check and eventually confirm.

author: chfast
content: Etherscan has a tool for it so you can cross-check with it. https://goto.etherscan.com/block/countdown/12244000
